comments:
3.1M6. Was trying to load the text editor example into my workspace as
instructed by:
http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/index.cgi/%7Echeckout%7E/platform-text-home/development/rcp/examples/index.html
I got to step 4 (Use the Browse button to select the zip file) and got some an
exception pasted below. The zip archive file doesn't look corrupt to WinZip.

I wonder why the Tar reader was chosen to read a zip file...

This is somewhat bizzarre but I can understand what is going on.
Rather than check extensions for Tar vs Zip, the respective inputstreams wrap
the file and attempt to read it.
There are any number of RuntimeExceptions that can be thrown if someone miscoded.  

Patch coming up...

Created an attachment (id=19662)
Handle all NumberFormatExceptions

Thanks Michael. I externalized Strings and generally tidied up and then released
the patch.
